name: PR_EST_TEMPLATE
description: The PR_EST_TEMPLATE table contains basic information about estimate template records, such as what the records are called, who created them, when they were created, when they should be retired, and what activity they are applicable for.

columns.name: PR_EST_TEMPLATE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the estimate template record.

columns.name: PR_EST_TEMPLATE_ID_PR_EST_TEMPLATE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the estimate template record.

columns.name: PR_EST_TEMPLATE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the estimate template record.
